import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {fetchPurchase, updatePurchase} from '../../redux/actions/purchase/purchaseAction' import { Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' function EditPurchase() { const {id} = useParams(); // Getting the purchase details from the store const purchaseList = useSelector(state => state.purchase) const {purchases, loading} = purchaseList; const [itemName, setItemName] = useState(purchases && !loading && purchases.itemName) const [productKey, setProductKey] = useState(purchases && !loading && purchases.productKey) const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(purchases && !loading && purchases.quantity) const [unitCost, setUnitCost] = useState(purchases && !loading && purchases.unitCost) const [unitPrice, setunitPrice] = useState(purchases && !loading && purchases.unitPrice) return (
Item Name setItemName(e.target.value)} /> Product Key setProductKey(e.target.value)} /> Quantity setQuantity(e.target.value)} /> Unit Cost setUnitCost(e.target.value)} /> Unit Price setUnitPrice(e.target.value)} />
) } export default EditPurchase
